summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Employee Incentive Scheme Issuance  
- **Securities Issued**: 169,253 unquoted **SHARE RIGHTS** (ASX code: ORGAN) under the **Employee Matching Share Plan**.  
- **Issue Date**: 29 April 2025.  
- **Employee Plan**: Summary terms in Section 3.6 of the Remuneration Report ([link](https://www.originenergy.com.au/about/investors-media/welcome-to-the-2024-annual-report/)).  
- **Total Unquoted Securities Post-Issue**:  
  - PERFORMANCE SHARE RIGHTS (ORGAK): 2,656,504  
  - SHARE RIGHTS (ORGAN): 1,011,009  
  - RESTRICTED SHARE RIGHTS (ORGAO): 3,339,575.  
- **No material dilution impact**: Issued under Listing Rule 7.2 (no shareholder approval required).  

*No other material trading/capital markets information identified.*
